name: Riverside Skatepark
description: Riverside Park's hidden gem — a well-maintained skatepark overlooking the Hudson River.
history: Opened in the 2010s as part of Riverside Park South expansion. Quickly became a UWS staple.
bestTimes: Golden hour sessions with Hudson River sunsets are unbeatable.
transitDirections: 1 train to 103rd St, walk west to the park.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include bowl, mini ramp, ledges, flat bars, bank. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Manhattan skate scene in Upper West Side. Opened in the 2010s as part of Riverside Park South expansion. Quickly became a UWS staple.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: 1 train to 103rd St, walk west to the park.. Golden hour sessions with Hudson River sunsets are unbeatable.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark — standard park etiquette applies.
